Class Hierarchy
This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
[detail level 123]
PvResult::Code
IPvDeviceAdapterInterface used by PvDeviceSerialPort to interact with a device controller
PvDeviceAdapterIPvDeviceAdapter default implementation for the eBUS SDK
IPvDeviceEventSinkInterface used by a class implementing IPvDeviceAdapter to forward notifications to PvDeviceSerialPort
PvActionCommandUtility class to send action command
PvBufferRepresents a block of GigE Vision or USB3 Vision data in memory
PvBufferConverterUsed to convert a PvBuffer to another pixel type
PvBufferConverterRGBFilterContains a RGB filter configuration that can be used with a PvBufferConverter
PvBufferWriterSaves the contents of a PvBuffer object to a raw data file or bitmap
PvConfigurationReaderRestore the state of the system
PvConfigurationWriterSave the state of the system
PvDeInterlacerDe-interlacing filter
PvDeviceConnect, configure and control a GigE Vision or USB3 Vision device
PvDeviceGEVConnect, configure and control a GigE Vision device
PvDeviceU3VConnect, configure and control a USB3 Vision device
PvDeviceEventSinkObserver interface for an observable PvDevice object
PvDeviceAdapterIPvDeviceAdapter default implementation for the eBUS SDK
PvDeviceI2CBusI2C serial controller
PvDeviceInfoInformation identifying a device
PvDeviceInfoGEVInformation identifying a GigE Vision device
PvDeviceInfoPleoraProtocolInformation about a Pleora Protocol device
PvDeviceInfoUSBInformation about a generic USB device
PvDeviceInfoU3VInformation about a USB3 Vision device
PvDevicePleoraProtocolClass simply used to configure the IP address of a Pleora Protocol device
PvDeviceSerialPortProvides access the a serial port on an device (Pleora GigE Vision device)
PvDeviceSPIBusSPI serial controller
PvDfwPayloadCurrently only used to generate reset and device ID DFW records from firmware update files
PvGenCategoryGenICam category
PvGenEnumEntryGenICam feature: Enumeration entry
PvGenEventSinkObserver interface for an observable PvGenParameter object
PvDeviceAdapterIPvDeviceAdapter default implementation for the eBUS SDK
PvGenFileAllows reading/writing to files hosted on the device
PvGenParameterBase class for all GenICam feature types
PvGenBooleanGenICam feature: Boolean. A feature which can either be true or false
PvGenCommandGenICam feature: Command. A feature which can only be activated
PvGenEnumGenICam feature: Enumeration. A feature which can take one of many defined values
PvGenFloatGenICam feature: Float
PvGenIntegerGenICam feature: Integer
PvGenRegisterGenICam feature: Register, or IRegister. A feature providing direct access to a section of the device's register map
PvGenStringGenICam feature: String
PvGenParameterArrayGenICam feature array
PvGenParameterListClass used to hold a group of PvGenParameter pointers
PvGenStateStackPerforms changes to a GenICam node map, tracks them and restores the previous state on destruction
PvImageImage interface to a PvBuffer
PvInterfaceRepresents one interface (network adapter or USB host controller) on a system (the PC)
PvNetworkAdapterRepresents one Ethernet network adapter on a system (the PC)
PvUSBHostControllerRepresents one USB host controller on a system (the PC)
PvPipelineHelper class for receiving data from a GigE Vision or USB3 Vision transmitter
PvPipelineEventSinkObserver interface for an observable PvPipeline object
PvPropertySimple name/value string pair class
PvPropertyListClass used to hold a group of PvProperty objects
PvRawDataRaw data interface to a PvBuffer
PvResultResult information
PvStreamReceive data from a GigE Vision or USB3 Vision transmitter
PvStreamGEVReceive data from a GigE Vision
PvStreamU3VReceive data from a USB3 Vision transmitter
PvStreamEventSinkEvent sink used to receive buffer queue/unqueue notifications
PvStringString class
PvStringListClass used to hold a group of PvString objects
PvSystemFind interfaces (network adapters or USB host controllers) and devices reachable from this PC
PvSystemEventSinkObserver interface for an observable PvSystem object
PvTftpClientSends or receives files from a GigE Vision video interface using the TFTP protocol
PvTransmitterGEVClass for transmitting blocks using the GigE Vision streaming protocol
PvTruesenseConverterConverts images from TRUESENSE(TM) to RGB
PvVirtualDeviceGEVVirtual GigE Vision device
PvWndWindow controller superclass
PvDeviceFinderWndGUI-based IP Engine finder
PvDisplayWndDisplay controller
PvGenBrowserWndFeature-controller window
